markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Drive Back](/Feats.aspx?ID=3617) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 81</row>

**Archetype** [Bastion](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=49)

**Prerequisites**
[Bastion Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1895)

**Access**
Knights of Lastwall have access to this feat.

**Trigger**
An enemy within your reach Strikes an ally adjacent to you.

**Requirements**
You have your shield raised.

</column>

---

You push the enemy back and attempt to intercede between the foe and your ally. You attempt to [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) the triggering enemy with your shield just as it attacks, pushing it back just after the attempt. Your shield has the [shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193) trait for this Shove attempt. If the shove succeeds, you throw off your enemy's timing, and the enemy takes a –1 circumstance penalty on its attack roll against your ally.
name: Drive Back
